name: bitpay-platform
description: 聚合支付平台 - 基於微服務架構的支付解決方案

scripts.install:all: npm run install:services && npm run install:portals
scripts.install:services: cd services/payment-service && npm install && cd ../merchant-service && npm install && cd ../agent-service && npm install && cd ../settlement-service && npm install && cd ../risk-control-service && npm install && cd ../channel-service && npm install
scripts.install:portals: cd portals/merchant-portal && npm install && cd ../agent-portal && npm install && cd ../admin-portal && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: for f in database/migrations/*.sql; do psql -h ${PG_HOST:-localhost} -p ${PG_PORT:-5432} -U ${PG_USER:-bitpay_user} -d ${PG_DATABASE:-bitpay_db} -f $f; done
